chess_py.game package¶

Submodules¶

chess_py.game.game module¶

Class that holds state of a game. Start game using play(), which returns the result when the game is finished.

Copyright © 2016 Aubhro Sengupta. All rights reserved.

class chess_py.game.game.Game(player_white, player_black)[source]¶
all_possible_moves(input_color)[source]¶
black_move()[source]¶
play()[source]¶

Starts game and returns one of 3 results . .

1 - White wins 0.5 - Draw 0 - Black wins

:rtype int

white_move()[source]¶

chess_py.game.game_state module¶

Static methods which check to see if game is over, and if a King is checkmated.

Copyright © 2016 Aubhro Sengupta. All rights reserved.

chess_py.game.game_state.is_checkmate(position, color)[source]¶

Finds if particular King is checkmated. :type position Board :type color Color :rtype bool

chess_py.game.game_state.no_moves(position)[source]¶

Finds if the game is over. :type position Board :rtype bool
